ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New to EQ and can't get it started!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ack.. hmm.. Do you have to be a registered user to contact a server GM? Can you even get into the chat? What are your system specs? Someone remind me I
ygData.messageBody:
> Hello. I bought eq today along with a game card. I installed it,
> went to new account, and when I click it it bounces me to the
> desktop. i dried disabling my firewall, soundcard, starting with
> all unnecessary processes disabled. uninstalled/installed many
> times. checked for irq and I found that the cable modem network
> cark was sharing 12 with the onboard sound, tried moving the network
> card and ended up having to reactivate xp! As it stands, I've yet
> to set foot in Norrath.
> I registered at the Station, and tried to use the tech bulliten
> board, but it won't let me post, says that I need to me a regisered
> user-- I thought I was!!
> anyways, that's why I'm here. PLEASE HELP!! I can't wait to play
> my new game!!!
> Thanks
> Dan
>
Ack.. hmm.. Do you have to be a registered user to contact a server GM?
Can you even get into the chat?
What are your system specs?
Someone remind me I need to try to get some Verant techies to join this
list..
luv,
-Su
